sentences.english: The selected video codec does not support interlaced processing.
sentences.chinese: 所选的视频编解码器不支持隔行扫描处理。

sentences.english: This is available in both interlaced and progressively scanned at a varying number for frame rates.
sentences.chinese: 隔行扫描和逐行扫描有不同数量的有效视频帧速率。

sentences.english: TV support has been added for PSP slim.
sentences.chinese: 隔行扫描电视支持已添加的PSP渺茫。
